jsx.graphic
Class SVG

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.graphic.SVG

public final class SVG
extends Disposable

A utility class providing static methods to create basic SVG components.

A SVG component wraps an HTML <svg:svg> element, a SVG path element or a SVG shape element.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

rectRound

public static final void rectRound(Component v,
                                   double rx,
                                   double ry)

Rounds off the corners of a rectangle by setting attributes to the SVG element wrapped by the specified component.

Parameters:
v - The current SVG component.
rx - The X-axis radius of the ellipse used to round off the corners of the rectangle.
ry - The Y-axis radius of the ellipse used to round off the corners of the rectangle.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
rect(), rectFrom(Component, double, double), rectSize(Component, double, double)
